name: Goennounce
overview:
GoEnnounce is the educational sharing and support system for students and their loved ones. It functions as the one place students can share academic updates and gain encouragement and financial assistance from family and friends for specific educational goals. Students can ennounce academic updates via their own personalized Student Page and invite loved ones to become Supporters. Students can also create Missions for specific educational endeavors in hopes to reach the their monetary goal through collective donations from family, friends and their social network.

The service allows a simple solution to the lack of communication and sharing of educational information between students and the people who care. Through the crowdfunding platform students are able raise funds for a specific educational goal and explain to their supporters why it is important and how their support could be incredibly beneficial.
